pattern by cinciut materials repeat rws 2-3 eight more times in total 19 rws at the 3mm hook end 100% acrylic yarn 50g = 140m balls knitting needle fold plant in half so that row 1 and row 19 face 3-4 see colors below or choose colors you like together make sts as in rw 2 crocheting both layers green yarn together to form a tube fasten_off leaving long tail to brown yarn close opening sew and close one opening stuff sew dark pink yarn the opposite opening with yarn left at beginning fig polyester fiberfill 1 stitch marker tapestry needle 1 pot 4cm height 4cm diameter stitch explanation/abbreviations chain =chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble fig 1 decrease = single_crochet decrease insert hook into the front loop of next two stitches yarn over draw through soil the 2 front loops finish with single_crochet with brown yarn start a magic_ring with 6 single_crochet sc3tog = double decrease insert hook in each of round 1 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts next 3 sts making a loop every time yarn over and round 2 work this round in bklp only single_crochet in each st around draw through all 4 loops finish with single_crochet 12 sts = work directions in brackets the number of round 3 single_crochet in first st 2 single_crochet in next st repeat 6 times 18 times specified this means that when it is written sts for example single_crochet in first 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat twice this means you have to repeat rnds 4-6
